data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Thane, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Thane, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 121,661 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Thane.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Thane
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bedar Naik Makkalu people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Thane.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, bless the county of Thane with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Thane, Maharashtra, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Thane
location.people_groups_list: Vaghri (Muslim traditions), Ellamalawar, Brahmin Saraswat, Alwar, Bawtar
